description: Presence of axillary nodal dissection and its characteristics

attributes.name: Presence of Axillary Nodal Dissection
attributes.description: Indicates whether the axillary nodal dissection is present or absent

attributes.name: Status
attributes.description: Indicates whether the axillary nodal dissection is new or unchanged

attributes.name: Side
attributes.description: Indicates the side of the axillary nodal dissection

values.name: Right
values.description: Axillary nodal dissection is on the right side

values.name: Left
values.description: Axillary nodal dissection is on the left side

values.name: Bilateral
values.description: Axillary nodal dissection is on both sides

attributes.name: Extent of Dissection
attributes.description: Indicates the extent of the axillary nodal dissection

attributes.name: Surgical Clips Present
attributes.description: Indicates whether surgical clips are present or absent

attributes.name: Fluid collection
attributes.description: Indicates the presence of fluid collection

attributes.name: Breast Mass
attributes.description: Indicates the presence of a breast mass

attributes.name: Breast Skin Thickening
attributes.description: Indicates the presence of breast skin thickening

attributes.name: Scar Tissue
attributes.description: Indicates the presence of scar tissue
